channel.title: xWretchedx (317)
channel.description:
Hello this is wretched. I am making a Skilling and Pking server. I will be posting updates daily of my progress and what i am doing. Today is my first day and i have already gotten a lot done.
[SIZE=6][FONT=Impact]DOWNLOAD HERE[/FONT][/SIZE]
[url=http://www.zshare.net/download/94841739e5264562/]http://www.zshare.net/download/94841739e5264562/[/url]
10/6/2011
Added Shops (No items in the shops yet) Added 240 custom NPC spawns [SIZE=4]Made it snowy since it's getting cold![/SIZE] Made a new home Renamed everything inside the Game to xWretchedx Made a new background Made a Donator Zone Made a Slayer Reward point system Made a Donator shop Started to make Crafting and Mining Added God sword Stances Added Bandos Made Custom commands Made custom spellbook teleports
10/7/2011
Added more Book Teleports Added ::commands Added 30 commands Added different health bar Added different arrows/scroll images added some items into shops (still not finished) Edited item prices Working Fight Pits Working Bandos Working Assault Working Pest control (with points!) Added new slayer task (not finished) Added some PK zones Added some different objects here and there
10/9/11
Finished all 26 shops! Added healer Added some more commands Every Npc's health is custom! Old school health bar Skills Finished 1. Woodcutting 2. Fletching 3. crafting 4. firemaking 5. fishing 6. cooking 7. mining 8. smithing 9. herblore 10. Slayer no Farming or Agility or thieving yet! Added more NPC's still need to add general Garadoor Added more NPC drops
10/10/11
Finished Barrows Finished Fight Pits Working on Pest control Added boss teleports Added some object to home added couple commands added a awesome mage bank!
10/11/2011
More NPCS More Items Cleaner Shops Npc's attack are fixed Hardened Npc's and bosses Added all pest control except for id's Added thieving (money) Added bowstring making Added some altars at home added 2 bosses added 2 teleport portals added a barrows tunnel
10/12/11
Added a barrows chest Added some objects to open/climb Added a Tzhaar Teleport Fixed the bowstring making Took out uneeded items in shop for a good economy Made thieving Fixed the exp skills and rate Money when smithing a bar Money when thieving Woodcuting and fire making and cooking work perfect REDOING ALL DROPS (too high of percentage of good ones) Added a KQ lair Added some new npc's to slayer task Changed the leveling around for skills Changed the ::commands starting adding the info for the ::commands
10/14/2011 Fixed many bugs Fixed many items Fixedmany xp rates added claws added some other items. New client finally works [FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=5][U]PICS[/U][/SIZE][/FONT] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/1568e9l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/25qwrpd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/50k076.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2i0ru6x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2lk5ikj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2m842dy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/eta5wl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/ipbg20.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/9swl0i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/33fb4ms.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2d6mzoj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/fyfona.png[/img]

Hello this is wretched. I am making a Skilling and Pking server.
I will be posting updates daily of my progress and what i am doing.
Today is my first day and i have already gotten a lot done.
